website_summaries.verdict: This chic gas fireplace is perfect for any outdoor space. If you don't want to deal with wood and ashes, this gas fireplace is an ideal choice.
pros: Includes rock bed and protective cover
Sleek panels hide the gas tank
Weather-resistant steel makes it highly durable

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Simple quick bonfire without the mess and smell
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Took me 3 tries with different products to learn that the cool looking tile table does not ship well and is not worth attempting to order. The pictures on this one are not that flashy, but the metal table is awesome. Arrived in great shape. and the nice part is if I forget or have too many sitting by the fire and forget to cover it then the water wipes right off and looks like know.
customer_reviews.author: blacksheepsigns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this firepit!! It's our first gas pit but the quality is excellent. Easy set, doesn't take up tons of room and if you get the clear and turquoise glass set it looks just amazing at night. The only downside is it doesn't come with a lid/pan to cover the actual firepit/glass area. I've looked all over and no one has a 17" lid for this model. If someone finds one please let me know. You won't regret your purchase. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Asael Ruben Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Added blue glass. Do wish it had a top to cover the rocks, so it could be used as an entire table, however, the cover it comes with is good. Take care of it and you should have no problem. The igniter is a little tricky. Turn the propane tank on first, wait awhile then hold ignition button in till it lights wait then turn to adjust flame. Can't be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Hayden

customer_reviews.title: CRAP PRODUCT W CRAP CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: A year later update- STILL NO CUSTOMER SERVICE RESPINSE. STILL DOES START correctly or easily. Do not buy!!!! ***** Having GREAT troubles starting it AND it staying lit. Think the starter thing is broken or just crap. Disappointed for certain. We added blue rock/glass to it. Other than, oh it not starting, it is nice. Probably need to return but if nothing else need something THAT WILL START! If it started the review would be Four Star, possibly five. Update: NEVER HEARD FROM SELLER. HOW DO WE RETURN SOMETHING COMPLETELY PUT TOGETHER. CRAP STARTER. WANT MOBEY BACK. CAN YOU SAY SMALL CLAIMS COURT. RESPOND SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: AzLady

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for a quality one
customer_reviews.text: Received the fire pit with a major flaw on the table top. Looks like someone tried to spot weld it and fix and area on the table top and never finished it. The paint was chipped off however its not worth packing it back up and returning it. Also after using it for a bit, it was extremely difficult to keep it lit. I had to keep restarting it like 15 times almost to the point where I turned it off. Im suspecting the value shooting out the gas is crappy. I gave it 2 stars because of the price, I suppose I got what I paid for
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Our fire table arrived well before the expected delivery date, which was a really nice surprise. It is a good-looking unit and my husband and I were able to put it together fairly quickly (neither of us being particularly handy). We bought some turquoise glass stones, which look beautiful in the fire. It is very easy to start the fire, just turn on the propane and turn the dial on the fire table. Once lit, the fire keeps going until we turn it off. We are really enjoying our patio this year thanks to this great little unit and are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after my 5 yo continually asked for a fire-pit. It arrived quickly and despite a couple of dents on the side panels(packaging issue not a manufacturer defect). Assembly was a cinch in less than one hour and starting the fire was a breeze. Family we have had over to visit raved about this and want to get one of their own. Bonus: no more s'mores on the BBQ. I also notice other reviews stating that the fire burns through propane quickly. I haven't noticed this and used it quite frequently for burn times of 2 hours or less and no tending to a wood fire plus no mess to clean up as well!
customer_reviews.author: makeiteasymeg

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breezy Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: Interested in a great fire pit without the fuss and muss of a beach pit with burning logs. This is great for the choice of atmosphere of a lighted area on my patio and also provides heat. My son put it together in about 15 minutes; easy breezy. Since I live in Michigan, I am looking forward to many lights of clean burning and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Covell

customer_reviews.title: So easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: So easy to operate. Wasn't bad to build. We got small brown glass pieces to go in and it looks just like firewood. We love sitting around this in our back yard at night. I also love that because it's gas, you can control the flame so no one gets accidentally injured from wood popping, etc. No more wood starting frustrations! It did have some dings on the top from shipping so I'd recommend that the shipped do its packing with more care.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Harden

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. So worth the money. Like that it's higher up so my dogs taik doesn't knock everything down. Easy to clean, doesn't have a cover that covers the rocks to make it a full tabke but does come with a rain cover which works great. Easy to put together and use . I don't think it would be amazing in the winter time for warmth but I live in WASHINGTON. Flame comes up higher then I thought it would and puts off some light.
customer_reviews.author: bob maguire

customer_reviews.title: Love my Fire Pit!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit! Very easy to assemble, solidly built and looks great! I called Blue Rhino and they walked me thru the initial startup. Now we're all set! works perfectly, even in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: Box came with a puncture in it which caused a small dent I. The table top piece. Nothing too noticeable. Took about 30 minutes to assemble using only a screw driver. Lighting was a little tricky but after pushing knob in, it worked much better and the flame stayed on. Looks nice when lit and gives a good flame and decent heat even on low flame setting.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice and has held up well enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and has held up well enough. But no matter what we can’t get it to light. Have to use a lighter to get it going.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Holdcraft

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Takes the chill off a cold night but wouldn't do much in winter months in the Midwest. Looks nice and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: jjshappyfiredog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect use for Florida winters
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with descriptive instructions. Total time from delivery to light up was about an hour. We've used it a handful of times, with the only complaint being the ignitor. Make sure to "prime" the burner for about 15 seconds. If not you'll be stuck lighting it with lighter. Cover seems fine, just don't leave it out under foliage or high winds. The weight should deter most scrawny thieves. This would get 5 stars with a better ignition system and if it was $10-$15 cheaper. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Clen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Over $100 less than the big box store for pretty much the same thing . Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Honda Dude

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good size, great for atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit. I bought this one because the measurements are a little smaller than some of the others. The only thing my wife said she didn't like is that it looks a little industrial. All black metal with no decorations. Also, it really doesn't provide heat. Mostly just for atmosphere. But it is so easy to fire up, we love sitting around it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit. It is exactly as described and was easy to assemble. The only downside is the cover is very thin. It ripped the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and liked the large booklet with instructions. Easy to assemble and took me about 30 minutes by myself. I purchased blue glass separately. Unit is not fancy but seems well designed. Takes a few tries to get it lit but after first few uses flame looks nice. If it holds up and ignition continues to work okay may change to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, and uses very little gas
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It works so well, and uses very little gas. We have enjoyed a dozen nights by the fire, and still on first tank. Does not put out much heat on low, but great ambience and some heat when on medium-high. Highly recommend this product! (Oh, and we are using the rocks that came with the product and are very happy with them)
customer_reviews.author: scuba diver

customer_reviews.title: Love the small size and the appearance
customer_reviews.text: Love the small size and the appearance. However, after several months of being stored outside with the cover on, the paint is starting to show signs of wear. Not too thrilled about that. The cover that's included is a joke. It tore on day two in a 10 mph breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusted within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved having a fire pit table. After about an hour of assembly, The product worked well and looked good. However, after about 3 months it rusted so bad the rust began bleeding on to my outdoor rug permanently staining it. I’m thankful for the rug so it didn’t stain my decking. The cover that came with the table ripped early on and now provides limited coverage from the elements. I’ll be throwing this table out and not purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie N

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well made and a great value for how nice it is.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for one of our daughters and her husband. We were surprised how nice and how large it was. They loved it. We bought two more for two of our other daughters and their husbands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! Looks great, works well. We have been using it intermittently for several months and haven't had any problems. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give less than one star I would. Ordered one, it had defective pieces so I exchanged it for another. The second one had an LP regulator the leaked in multiple spots. Just straight junk. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: MAC231

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Other than the US Postal Service refusing to deliver it because it was too heavy for the lazy driver very happy with the fire pit
customer_reviews.author: Hayden K. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: It took about 45 minutes to put it together lit on the first try only had occasion to use it once so far but look forward to using it all winter in AZ. in the winter when the sun goes down it gets down right cold and I think this unit will keep un nice and cozy on the patio
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like having something for one month, and it stop working...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I've had this for about a month, and have used it 3 times. It never lit on its own, which was no big deal, but now it will not stay lit! You'd think that for $200 or so, you'd actually get something that would last for more than a month! Unfortunately, it's now out of the Amazon return window, so I can't send it back. Hopefully the seller or manufacturer will resolve this issue...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up and this fall has been awesome using ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and this fall has been awesome using this on those cool nights to stay out with family and friends chatting in the backyard after dark when it gets a little to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Martinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice !
customer_reviews.text: This works on our covered deck. It's not real strong, but being under cover, I think it will hold up. The starter is a little difficult. But once you get used to it, it works fine. The black glass looks amazing. It does not have a lid to cover everything, which would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Didi D.

customer_reviews.title: nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this fire pit! It brings such a nice ambiance to our outdoor space. Putting our feet up on the ledge, and visiting with friends. We also use it to keep the mosquitoes at bay, since they are not fond of fire. It makes our small outdoor space feel so special. We use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Sisu

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love our fire table! Easy to assemble and good quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: jeniB

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great as advertised however
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great as advertised however, the paint on the top is starting to come off in a few spots after only 2 weeks of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Three months and done
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while, now it doesn't light, even with a lighter. This was always covered. Very disappointed with the product quality. When it did work, it put out a great flame.
customer_reviews.author: GalvezGuy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty part
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the thermal coupling, which keeps the fire lit, after the return 90 day limit. Contacted the seller, MInnovations and they would do nothing. Be sure to buy from another fire pit manufacturer. They should have been able to supply the faulty part replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hayner

customer_reviews.title: Hard to light
customer_reviews.text: It will not stay lit. I have to keep fussing with the knob and propane for about 30 minutes at every use. Huge pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rosen

customer_reviews.title: nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: I built a roofed enclosure behind my house and this unit fir the bill to stave off the night chills
customer_reviews.author: Winter Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Assembly was easy. Doesn’t put out a ton of heat, it’s more for the look and ombiance. We get tons of compliments on it though.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. At 66 I was able o do all the assemble by my self and carry this out to my lawn alone. Look forward to many summer nights enjoying the warm glow with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Melody N.

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase! I have previously owned wood burning fire pits, and was going to buy another one (as they only last few years) because I love the wood burning smell, but am so happy with how easy this is to start and enjoy! We have had multiple roasted marshmallows and just hanging out! Easy to put together also!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kainrath

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fire pit! It’s easy to start and easy to turn it off without having to worry about cleaning up or hot coals.. we roast marshmallows on it or just sit around and feel the warmth. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Surface

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fire pit. Arrived a day late, in great shape. Easy to assemble, instructions could be a little more clear. All steel construction.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lost cost fire pit, They made it happen and it's great quality. Only thing that could be improved is quality of the cover is mediocre. Ripped immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit and super on our patio. Had some assembly issues and called them received immediate help. Well worth the money and the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Howze

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble... looks and works great. Haven't been able to use it much in this triple-digit heat wave, but looking forward to enjoying it more this fall!
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Did we receive one with a defective igniter? I think so!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy to assemble but we are having difficulty with the igniter. It ignited once on its own but after numerous tries after the initial lighting, my husband has to ignite it with a lighter. There must be some problem but it would be such a hassle to send this back at this point. Disappointed because the auto igniter would make lighting the fire pit so easy - that's why only three star review. Anyone else experiencing this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Sambolee

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I Purchased the glass rock and put into that along with the rock that was provided. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: TDgal

customer_reviews.title: It is what the reviews say!
customer_reviews.text: It was everything we hoped for - easy to put together, gave off heat, good quality, very reasonable price! This is second one we purchased for a different location!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't put out a lot of heat, but it works and it is beautiful. Plus you don't have to smell like a campfire every time you want to sit around a fire. Which is the reason I purchased this in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lite and adds just the right mood to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected. Easy to lite and adds just the right mood to the patio.
customer_reviews.author: michael udell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it- use it on the deck on cool nights. Provides heat, light and ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: ChampAmy

customer_reviews.title: ... the price of this thing hands down it is great. Good quality and fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this thing hands down it is great. Good quality and fairly easy to put together. Just don't be like me and install the tank tray backwards........ Only thing to note is the cover is super thin and the wife ripped it on day 2. But it's what I would expect for a free cover at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but this literally started rusting 1 day after being ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but this literally started rusting 1 day after being outside. I even have it covered overnight. Woke up next day and its rusted. Too much of a pain to return
customer_reviews.author: Jon C

customer_reviews.title: Just like using an outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Hold the Pilot lighter about 2 -3 secs long to startup ,Just like using an outdoor grill, same idea in regartds to lighting. Otherwise no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect patio addition
customer_reviews.text: I love this gas fire pit. Easy to assemble, perfect size, well made and looks great! Thanks Amazon for the recommendation!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The cover is cheap and needs to be replaced ASAP but other than that it is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Set up is tricky but all around a good product
customer_reviews.text: It took me a bit to set up the fireplace but I really like it. Make sure you have a really good propane tank because this sucker will take all the gas in just a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped several places for this! And this was a fantastic price! Fast shipping! Gives off great heat and the perfect ambience!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect it fits in the spot to sit around and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Toenges

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: This worked for us for a year. My husband tried to clean the valve but it has completely quit working. We only used it one season. We kept it covered in the off season as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, perfect size for the upper deck, looks great, sturdy, we really enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fire element for focal point.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fire element on our back deck. Just ordered a second one. Easy to put together and glass rocks look nicer than the lava rocks you see on most similar models.
customer_reviews.author: TeseStephens

customer_reviews.title: Nice find !
customer_reviews.text: My family really like this product. Good value for our budget.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Egan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but not the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, but not the highest quality. My igniter works sometimes, other times you light with a lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! It comes with rocks so we returned the ones we purchased. Hands down one of the best investments we made!!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy and though we have only had it for a little while, we are enjoying it very much. We live in FL, so we aren't needing heat much from it, and last night had to turn it off because the heat was too much.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous that the required lava rocks are "sold separately". To add aggravation they are out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A Trottier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic firepit
customer_reviews.text: On our third season still looks and works great! Recommend to keep a cover over it for keeping it in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J.

customer_reviews.title: ... fire table as a gift and was more than pleased - easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I gave this fire table as a gift and was more than pleased - easy to assemble, gives out good heat, looks great
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Get a different cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover that it came with took off the paint on the top of the fire pit! There are big spots everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and works great. It does put off plenty of heat and light. I have already recommended it to other family members.
customer_reviews.author: jamie bardwell

customer_reviews.title: Really a great price for a fire pit that looks this good
customer_reviews.text: Really a great price for a fire pit that looks this good. If you want a fire pit and don't want to spend $500 - $1,000, this is a great one to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire pit starts right up easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Nica

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Comes with dark glass and a cover. Love having it
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but came dented
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but came dented. Can’t really see the dent and did not want to go through the hassle of returning,but not sure I’ll order another big item like this again!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T Stieg

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the fire pit but the cover easily is tearing. Can it be replaced with a heavier weight cover
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Mangano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal...very attractive! Our arrived with a scratch on the door and they immediately sent out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: C. Church

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with lighting
customer_reviews.text: Like the fire pit, assembly not difficult. Problem with lighting, only lit once using the switch, the rest of the times I have had to light with match.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Went together easily, came with everything needed to enjoy right away. Just add a propane tank!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Did not take too long to put together. OK flame. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For what its worth, this pit has come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking propane fire pit. Was not too difficult to assemble. Works great! Terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Reamy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks fine, but was damaged during shipping. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Snoubar

customer_reviews.title: Flame does not stay lit.
customer_reviews.text: It does not stay lit when you put the glass provided by manufacturer over the top of the burner. Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!!! Good Price! Didn't like the fact that the FIRST ONE was lost. BUT, Amazon sent another one at no extra cost to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for the ambiance in an Oregon summer evening
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't produce a lot of heat, but perfect for the ambiance in an Oregon summer evening. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Landon and Sarah Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small but very nice.not a lot of heat.mostly for the looks.you know,to set the mood!
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but won't start. Now have to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, but heat output is insufficient for below 60 degrees outside. Nice looking flame though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and was easy to assemble but has some issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and was easy to assemble but has some issues both getting and staying lit. The least little breeze and poof it goes out. And getting it lit is frustrating even with following all the advice I've read.
customer_reviews.author: Daureen K Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is perfect for our small patio under our metal roof gazebo. My husband put it together quickly and the flame adds a cozy warmth on a cool night in Southern California.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNIT
customer_reviews.text: UNIT CAME IN ONE BOX. AN EXTRA SET OF HANDS MAKES ASSEMBLY VERY EASY. UP AND READY TO GO. ALL WEATHER COVER VERY DURABLE. WOULD HAVE LIKED A METAL COVER TO GO OVER GLASS AS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and it was easy enough to put together
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and it was easy enough to put together... I lit it up right away, and it stayed on for about an hour. Then I tried to turn it back on an hour later to show my dad and the flame wasn't as strong. I will try it again tomorrow-I'm getting a little worried now that I'm reading the reviews about the starter being a problem but I'm hoping it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was set up in minutes and lighting was easy. I added the blue rock and she was ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife's 60th birthday. It was set up in minutes and lighting was easy. I added the blue rock and she was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Part of this product rusted within a week. Ignition has serious issues. I would not recommend. Also, the cover ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Rope Home

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hard to review when all the pieces to put it together aren't included!
customer_reviews.author: Temperance

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. First it was missing the fourth leg so ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. First it was missing the fourth leg so had to call Blue Rhino to ship another leg. Then the hose was faulty so propane was leaking so sent it back. Don't buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted! It took about 30 minutes to put together. We enjoy the ambiance of the fire, and it gives off some heat, but not like a wood fire. It has a striker knob and lights quickly. The ledge around the pit is about 9" wide. Comes with a plastic cover. Good price. Arrived within 2 days, no damage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Phelps

product_meta.title: Endless Summer LP Gas Outdoor Fire Bowl with Steel Mantel
product_meta.description: With its steel mantel, this handcrafted Endless Summer LP fire pit, by blue rhino, features the classic elements of high end furniture, with the durability of weather resistant steel. Its decorative base cleverly conceals a propane tank (not included) & control panel, making it an attractive centerpiece for your outdoor living space. Complete with a 30,000 BTU stainless steel burner, you can enjoy all the ambiance of a classic fire without the mess of tending ashes. Adding to the elegance, this unit is available with colored fire glass that beautifully Accents its flames. The unit is easy to assemble with no tools needed, & includes a 1-year limited warranty & protective cover.
feature_bullets: Rock bed and protective cover included
Sleek panels hide the gas tank. Ignition Type: Electronic control
